title: Apple chutney
ingredients: ['15 tart apples - peeled, cored, and finely chopped', '1 onion, quartered', '3 (2.5cm) pieces fresh root ginger, peeled', '250ml white wine vinegar', '100g caster sugar', '75g dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon white pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
